Title: The Predator
Writer: Fred Dekker, Shane Black, Jim Thomas (based on characters created by), John Thomas (based on characters created by)
Actors: Boyd Holbrook, Trevante Rhodes, Jacob Tremblay, Keegan-Michael Key
Plot: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.
